title: Does Sheikh Assim accept gifts from his followers & fans? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: like it could be a letter a gift from the people who admire you just like a location i don't understand what do you mean by that chick i i meant a fan mail like uh those who admire you if they want to send you a gift from abroad or any other country the prophet islam used to accept gifts and he would never return them so the concept of accepting gift is the responsibility of every muslim if someone comes to me and says this is a a pen i give it to you as a gift i would not say no no no i have one blind my pocket i don't i don't need this no the prophet used to accept gift says islam but he would not accept charity so this is acceptable to all people inshallah without any problem you
